hero.headline: Mission &
hero.description: We believe connectivity is not a luxury — it's infrastructure. Like roads, electricity, and clean water, digital access is fundamental to human opportunity in the 21st century.

mission.title: Bridge the digital divide through sovereign, sustainable infrastructure
mission.description: 3.7 billion people lack reliable internet access. Traditional approaches fail because they assume connectivity, depend on external cloud services, and require infrastructure that doesn't exist. We build a different way — offline-first, solar-powered, and locally owned.

vision.title: A world where geography is no longer destiny
vision.description: We envision a world where every community has access to the digital tools that can transform their lives. Where a student in rural Rwanda has the same learning resources as one in San Francisco. Where local economies can participate in the global digital economy.

manifestoQuote: The digital divide is not a technology problem. It's an infrastructure problem. And infrastructure problems require infrastructure solutions.

values.title: Sovereignty
values.description: Communities and nations should control their own digital infrastructure. We build technology that enables ownership, not dependency.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: Technology must work within environmental and economic constraints. Our platform runs on solar power and costs less than traditional alternatives.

values.title: Accessibility
values.description: Digital services should be available to everyone, regardless of location or connectivity. We design for the last mile first.

values.title: Impact
values.description: We measure success by the real-world outcomes we enable — jobs created, students educated, services delivered.

milestones.title: Founded
milestones.description: TrueLeap founded with the mission to bridge the digital divide through sovereign infrastructure.

milestones.title: First Deployment
milestones.description: Pilot deployment in rural Rwanda connects 50 schools to digital learning resources.

milestones.title: Series Seed
milestones.description: $4M seed round led by development-focused impact investors.

milestones.title: Scale
milestones.description: Expanded to 15 countries, deployed 500+ edge nodes, connected 2M people.

milestones.title: Product Launch
milestones.description: Launched Leapspace, Digital Twin, and Leapcast as integrated platform.

milestones.title: Series A
milestones.description: $18M Series A to accelerate deployment across Africa and Southeast Asia.

cta.headline: Join us in bridging the divide
cta.description: We're building a team of mission-driven engineers, designers, and operators. If you believe technology should serve everyone, we want to hear from you.
